title: Mid lane help

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: **I suck at mid lane.** I sometimes have good matches in normals but as soon as I play ranked or a match with a friend with slightly higher mmr I get absolutely ruined and I don't know what I'm doing wrong. I know how to ward, deny creeps, position, zone and would say that I know how to play mid good. I just can't wrap my mind around what I'm doing wrong. Any tips for me?

replies.body: Your cs is extremely low, even in the games you're winning. You also probably need to get a better understanding of when people can kill you so you know when to back off. Focus on farming well without dying and you will see a dramatic improvement in your strength mid-game. Worry about killing/denying your enemy once you can already farm well yourself.
Your ranked team has a plat and a gold, so your getting matched with Goldish players, and you may be good as a mid laner in bronze, that doesn't mean your a good mid laner in gold.
But even in bronze I suck.

Aye, let us know what midlaners you play, and we can advise you of common matchups, build-paths and itemization mistakes.

The rest is mechanics, good sir. Game mechanics and champ mechanics. That stuff you have to learn for yourself.
I play Zed, Talon, Katarina, Ekko, Leblanc and Lux. I only started playing midlane this year which Is why I have such a low pool of champs.
what champs do u play mid.
